name.description: Specifies the name of the Maintenance Configuration. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group where the Maintenance Configuration should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specified the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scope.description: The scope of the Maintenance Configuration. Possible values are `All`, `Host`, `Resource` or `InResource`. Default to `All`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource. The key could not contain upper case letter.

id.description: The ID of the Maintenance Configuration.

create.description: Used when creating the Maintenance Configuration.

update.description: Used when updating the Maintenance Configuration.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Maintenance Configuration.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Maintenance Configuration.
